      • incrementBlocks

        public static byte[] incrementBlocks(byte[] counter,
                     long blockDelta)
        Increment the rightmost 64 bits of a 16-byte counter by the specified delta. Both the specified delta and the resultant value must stay within the capacity of 64 bits. (Package private for testing purposes.)
        参数:
        counter - a 16-byte counter.
        blockDelta - the number of blocks (16-byte) to increment

      • fromCEKAlgo

        public static CryptoScheme fromCEKAlgo(String cekAlgo)
